/bad {record_name} {words space separated}

example:

this rule will match every message containing all the words

[Error!]
The provided id is invalid. Use /ban replying to a message from the user or use /get, in reply to a message, to get his/her user id.

[Error!]
This username is not in cache. Use /ban replying to a message from the user or use /get, in reply to a message, to get his/her user id.

[Error!]
You are not an admin of this group.

error_addnote_command_onreply:
‚ö†Ô∏è Syntax error:

/addnote can be used on reply of a message that starts with a #tag
error_addnote_command_starttag:
‚ö†Ô∏è Syntax error:

/addnote {first tag} {note's text}

example:
/addnote #Topics
This is the list of topics:
- #Games
- #Movies
- #Food

the note will be matched by every tag present in the note's text

Missing command argument(s)

To close the group: /gate close
error_not_auth_command: You are not authorized to run this command.
message_group_first_join:
ü•≥ Welcome in unified/ban! ü•≥

Allow me to suggest you the next steps:
First of all run the command /check to see if I have the correct permissions to work properly.
Use the command /help to get a list of commands.

‚ùîIn case of doubts: reach my operators in the [unifiedban group](https://t.me/unifiedban_group) or, if this is a public group, use /call to receive them here.
üìöthe documentation is at [this link](https://docs.unifiedban.solutions/)

üëÄTo know if an user is a certified operator you can reply /id to any of his messages and I'll tell you the truth.

üì£Remember to follow me in the[ news channel](https://t.me/unifiedban_news)
and on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/unifiedban).
üîéKeep an eye on [my logs](https://t.me/unifiedban_logs)
üìçAnd last, but not least, follow my creators on [Twitch](https://www.twitch.tv/prometheus_studio/)

I hope we'll enjoy our time together!
